Sentencas: La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCF) is a promising cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Structured La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ cathode with large-scale vertical cracks by atmospheric laminar plasma spraying for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Hence, structured LSCF coatings were deposited in this study by atmospheric laminar plasma spraying (ALPS) at the spraying distances from 150 mm to 250 mm.
Titulo: Structured La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ cathode with large-scale vertical cracks by atmospheric laminar plasma spraying for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Particles with high temperature were obtained at low plasma arc power of only 15 kW.
Titulo: Structured La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ cathode with large-scale vertical cracks by atmospheric laminar plasma spraying for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The microstructural characterization of the coatings showed cluster-like morphologies on the top surfaces and columnar features with large-scale vertical cracks at the cross section.
Titulo: Structured La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ cathode with large-scale vertical cracks by atmospheric laminar plasma spraying for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: An evolution mechanism of the coatings was proposed based on particle size.
Titulo: Structured La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ cathode with large-scale vertical cracks by atmospheric laminar plasma spraying for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The movement of particles during laminar plasma jet depended on particle size, which was studied experimentally and by simulation to explain the selective deposition.
Titulo: Structured La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ cathode with large-scale vertical cracks by atmospheric laminar plasma spraying for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The coatings showed lower polarization resistance when compared to LSCF coatings deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying (APS) due to large vertical crack densities.
Titulo: Structured La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ cathode with large-scale vertical cracks by atmospheric laminar plasma spraying for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The high output performance of the SOFCs with the LSCF cathode also proved this phenomenon.
Titulo: Structured La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ cathode with large-scale vertical cracks by atmospheric laminar plasma spraying for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The results suggest that ALPS provides extensive options for SOFCs manufacturing.
Titulo: Structured La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ cathode with large-scale vertical cracks by atmospheric laminar plasma spraying for IT-SOFCs
